column4: The ferry is closed until further notice due to high water conditions.
Motorists should treat dark intersections as 4-way stops.  Use added caution while power is being restored.

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for 4th of July Events:
column4: Closures scheduled from Sunday July 2 thru Tuesday July 4.
